title: An Invitation to Japan
brief_description: Shows the tourist attractions found along Japan’s most representative travel route: Tokyo, Nikko, Kamakura, Hakone, Kyoto, Nara, Osaka, highlighting such places as the Great Buddha at Kamakura, the Olympic Games site and the Toshogu Shrine at Nikko. Also shows typical Japanese food, pearls, kimonos, porcelain and textiles.
